title: Mech Behavior-Materials
description: The correlation of mechanical properties with atomic bonding, microstructure, and micromechanics, for applications relevant to materials selection and design, mechanical forming, and failure of materials.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MSE 2001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and COE 3001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
